metadata.title: CVE-2017-16852 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
shibsp/metadata/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in the Dynamic MetadataProviderplugin in Shibboleth Service Provider before 2.6.1 fails to properlyconfigure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not performcritical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement ofvalidity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka SSPCPP-763.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16852` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-shib2 - 2.6.1+dfsg1-2
libshibsp-plugins - 2.6.1+dfsg1-2
libshibsp7 - 2.6.1+dfsg1-2
shibboleth-sp2-common - 2.6.1+dfsg1-2
shibboleth-sp2-utils - 2.6.1+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1+dfsg1-2').
